text: WFFR-LP (100.9 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Roosevelt Park, Michigan. The station is owned by Shoreline Broadcasting, Inc. It airs a classic hits format. The station was assigned the WFFR-LP call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on April 9, 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * FFR-LP FFR-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in Michigan Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States Category:Muskegon County, Michigan
title: WFFR-LP
